properties.address: Great Norwood Street, Cheltenham, Gloucestershire GL50 2AP
properties.description: Come and receive a Warm Welcome at Bethesda open every Wednesday from 10.30am to 3.30pm Wi-Fi, Hot snacks and drinks, games and papers available
properties.title: Bethesda Church Cheltenham

properties.description: Bishops Cleeve Library is located in the car park next to Tesco supermarket. It has cycle racks and step free access with all services situated on the ground floor. Libraries are traditionally a place where people can go without judgement or cost and we offer a range of core services all year round. What we are offering: •Warm, dry buildings spaces to sit and keep warm •Free access to Wi-Fi and free computer access with a Library membership •Places to charge your devices •Signposting to advice and support •Regular groups, activities and events ranging from jigsaw puzzles to social sessions •A free warm drink To find out more about what we offer visit gloucestershire.gov.uk/libraries/warm-and-welcome/. Library Membership is free and you can join online at gloucestershire.gov.uk/libraries/join-the-library/ or visit your local library. Discover and browse events at gloucestershire.spydus.co.uk
properties.title: Bishops Cleeve Library

properties.address: Bredon Village Hall, Bredon, Glos GL20 7QN
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 2nd November 2023** We are open on the 1st and 3rd Thursday of the month. On the first Thursday we will offer a warm meal, and on the second Thursday a hot drink and cake/biscuits.
properties.title: Bredon Warm Welcome

properties.description: Our library offers a large collection of books for adults and children, free WiFi and access to computers. We host regular activities for adults and children, many of which are free. Located near the high street we are easily accessible by public transport. Public car parks nearby.
properties.title: Broadway Library

properties.description: Cheltenham Library is located on Clarence Street and is accessible via steps to the front of the building and a ramp to the rear. properties.description: Opening dates are as follows: Sundays 10.00 – 12.30 with hot breakfast, cake, tea and coffee: 12th Nov (after Remembrance Service), 10th Dec, 14th Jan, 11th Feb and 10th March. Christmas Eve for festive refreshments 5.00pm – 07.00pm Thursdays 2.00 – 4.30 with a tea (sandwiches, soup, cake and drinks: 23rd Nov, 14th Dec, 18th Jan and 22nd Feb

properties.description: The space is open to all secondary school aged young people. We welcome anyone in to socialise with their friends in a warm safe environment with experienced youth workers available to support all. Our space offers a variety of games/activites, hot drinks & refreshments.

properties.description: The Minster is open daily 11am to 1pm for visitors, child friendly, peaceful, warm. Sunday service at 11am each week with Evensong on the second Sunday of the month at 3.30pm
